short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MyMusicFind - Search for your favourite tunes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MyMusicFind is a music search extension designed to enhance your music exploration directly from your Chrome browser. MyMusicFind simplifies the music search process, offering a quick and free way to find the tunes you love. You can start searching for your favorite songs, artists, or albums effortlessly. 
The intuitive shortcut allows you to search for your favorite music by simply typing 'm' and pressing TAB in the browser's search bar. 

How to use:  
Install MyMusicFind extension by clicking the "Add to Chrome" button and following any on-screen prompts to complete the installation. 
For a convenient search of your favorite song or music artist, simply use the following shortcut: type ‘m’ and press the TAB key, and once you've entered your query press enter.

By clicking on the 'Add to Chrome' button and installing MyMusicFind, you agree to install this extension and set Chrome™ default search according to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service. Please note that this extension will change your default search in Chrome browser to Yahoo. Further information can be found at the following links. 
https://mymusicfind.com/terms
https://mymusicfind.com/privacy
https://mymusicfind.com/about-us

MyMusicFind is a search extension that provides links to external service providers like YouTubeMusic and others. 
Please note that the availability of content and features on the service provided is subject to the terms and conditions 
Of the service’s platform. For more information please visit our Term page at https://mymusicfind.com/terms
